title: Jobs at Riot
body:
Hello! 

I don't really knew where to post this or if I should even do it here (rather than create a ticket), but here goes! 
I'm about half a year away from graduating with a BA specializing in "International Management" coming from Economics; Business and Leadership - and I've been interested for a long time for a potential job/internship with RiotGames, is there a specific mail where I can directly ask about one (with additional info and so on about myself)? 
I am indeed aware of that they have a page with open positions and where they are available, to that I'd like to add: I live in Norway and I'm doing a study abroad programme in Berlin (where I will be graduating (Spring 2018)), I am willing to move around for the opportunity. 

My summoner name is: Kyu Bear (previous was Best Daddy) - Do reply anyhow you see fit, but please keep it relevant =) 

Thank you for your time and battle on in the Fields of Justice!
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} 

EDIT: I would like to clarify that my Summoner Name is on EUW.

replies.body: Honestly, the best way to get info on potential jobs is by checking the page 50Shades linked you! We don't all get day to day info on all the new job openings, so that's always going to be your best route for info. Applying to one of the positions should give you an opportunity to inquire about finer details.

Thank you! 

Posted the same post on the EUW side of the forum and got more detailed answers from one of your coworkers =)
https://www.riotgames.com/careers This link provides all positions they are looking for.Hope it helps
